biography: Olli is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Hirsala Golf his home club.

He has a consistent record of participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée, having competed in the tournament every year since 2022.  His dedication and skill are evident in his impressive performance history.

Olli’s achievements include a remarkable victory in the 2023 Hector Trophée, showcasing his prowess in team competition.  Further demonstrating his exceptional talent, he secured the coveted Victor trophy in 2024, a testament to his individual golfing abilities.
His consistent presence and impressive wins make Olli a formidable competitor and one to watch in future Hector Trophée tournaments.
